title: Berger Nagadpati(BNP)
description: Berger Paints Nepal present Berger Nagadpati(BNP)

title: Bajaj Motercycle Dashain Tihar Offer
description: यो दशैं तिहारमा बजाज बाईकको खरिदमा पाउनुहोस एउटा स्क्रयाच कुपन जसमा तपाईले स्क्रयाच गरी जित्न सक्नुहुनेछ रु. ६ लाख सम्म INSTANT CASH । Bajaj चढ्नेको बेग्लै शान । /n #PulsarNepal #BajajNepal /n More: www.bajajauto.com.np

title: The stock clearance 2074
description: The stock clearance 2074 fair is going to be held at Bhakkukimandrap, Kathmandu on the occosation of Dashin festival from 6 to 11 September 2017 (21 to 26 Bhadra 2074). Event Solution is going organize this fair. Textiles, shoes, handsets, furts, mobile, cosmetics, electronics, food products and Home appliances will be available. The organizer has estimated that more than 50 thousand consumer will vist the fair.

title: Chakkama Chakka Nagad Pakka
description: This festive season buy any SUZUKI motorcycle and scooter and get a chance to win sure shot cash prize of Rs.7000 in motorcycle and Rs.9000 in scooter. Also, you can get a chance to win up to Rs.1 lakh in scratch card and Renault KWID in Bumper prize.

title: उपहार यस्तो हरेक घण्टा रमाऊ जस्तो
description: The scheme “उपहार यस्तो हरेक घण्टा रमाऊ जस्तो” will run for 25 days from 1st of September to 25th of September. This scheme will no an emphasis on a single winner but there will be as much as 400 winners to keep the festive mood intact. And the winner will be selected every hour from the official Facebook page of Huawei .

title: Dashain Offer
description: The offer brings you various gift hampers. The list includes Bangkok Tour, Dubai Tour, Pulsar motorcycle, Silver or Gold Coins. It also gives you a chance to win extra Mi products. Mi Laptop, Mi Phones, Mi Scooter or Mi Television.If you are feeling lucky, taking part is very simple. You have to buy any Mi phones or smartphones from official retail stores in Nepal. The offer is valid until Tihar, so hurry up!

title: Volkswagen Dashain Tihar Double Offer!!
description: This festive season, take life to next level. Experience Volkswagen, get upto 8 Lakhs cash disount and assured 2 Lakhs Exchange bonus in your old car.

title: CG festive offers
description: यस दशैं तिहार तथा छठमा CG को शानदार सामानहरुको खरिदमा पक्का उपहार तथा आकर्षक नगद छुट पाउनुहोस |
